verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w Zophar|strong="H6691"\w*, \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w*, \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*,

“Shouldn’t \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w*? \w Should|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6030"\w* full \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w talk|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*?

Should \w your|strong="H4962"\w* boastings \w make|strong="H2790"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* hold \w their|strong="H4962"\w* \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*? When you \w mock|strong="H3932"\w*, \w will|strong="H2790"\w* no man \w make|strong="H2790"\w* you \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*?

\w For|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H5869"\w* say, ‘\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w doctrine|strong="H3948"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w*. \w I|strong="H5869"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w* \w in|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w oh|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w*,

\w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* would \w show|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w secrets|strong="H8587"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* true \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w two|strong="H3718"\w* \w sides|strong="H3718"\w*. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w* exacts \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3045"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* deserves.

“Can \w you|strong="H5704"\w* fathom \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mystery \w of|strong="H2714"\w* God? \w Or|strong="H5704"\w* can \w you|strong="H5704"\w* probe \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w limits|strong="H8503"\w* \w of|strong="H2714"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*?

\w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w high|strong="H1363"\w* \w as|strong="H1363"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w do|strong="H6466"\w*? \w They|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* \w than|strong="H6013"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*.\f + \fr 11:8 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w Its|strong="H3220"\w* \w measure|strong="H4055"\w* \w is|strong="H4480"\w* longer \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* \w broader|strong="H7342"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w If|strong="H2498"\w* \w he|strong="H7725"\w* \w passes|strong="H2498"\w* \w by|strong="H7725"\w*, \w or|strong="H4310"\w* confines, \w or|strong="H4310"\w* convenes \w a|strong="H3068"\w* court, \w then|strong="H7725"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* oppose \w him|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w knows|strong="H3045"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w*. \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w sees|strong="H7200"\w* iniquity \w also|strong="H3588"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* doesn’t \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w An|strong="H3205"\w* empty-headed man becomes \w wise|strong="H3823"\w* when \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w is|strong="H6501"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* as \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkey|strong="H6501"\w*’s \w colt|strong="H5895"\w*.

“If \w you|strong="H3820"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w aright|strong="H3559"\w*, \w stretch|strong="H6566"\w* \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w toward|strong="H3709"\w* \w him|strong="H3559"\w*.

If \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w it|strong="H7368"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H7368"\w*. Don’t let \w unrighteousness|strong="H5766"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w your|strong="H3027"\w* tents.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w spot|strong="H3971"\w*. \w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3332"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*,

\w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H4325"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* like \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w Life|strong="H2465"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w clearer|strong="H6965"\w* than \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*. Though \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* darkness, \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* secure, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*. \w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w search|strong="H2658"\w*, \w and|strong="H7901"\w* \w will|strong="H3426"\w* \w take|strong="H7901"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w rest|strong="H7901"\w* \w in|strong="H7901"\w* safety.

Also \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w lie|strong="H7257"\w* \w down|strong="H7257"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w no|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* \w make|strong="H2729"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*. Yes, \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w will|strong="H7227"\w* court \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w favor|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*. \w They|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w no|strong="H4480"\w* \w way|strong="H4498"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* flee. \w Their|strong="H3615"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* giving \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w spirit|strong="H5315"\w*.”
